name: Bright 1bed facing Golden Dome
neighborhood_overview: Beacon Hill is located downtown and is conveniently located to multiple forms of transportation, shopping, restaurants, the State House and the Boston Common.
description:
Bright, spacious unit, new galley kitchen, new Casper queen size bed, great closets, flat screen tv & wireless internet. The building features a doorman, common roofdeck & laundry each floor. Awesome location close to everything!

The space
Bright one bed facing the golden dome of the State House. Great closet space, sleeper sofa and new Casper queen bed. Rent includes high speed internet, basic cable, phone, furnishings, linens, kitchen and house wares. Laundry, trash and recycle on each floor. The building has a concierge, elevator, amazing roof deck with views of the State House and the Boston Common. Fantastic location close to transportation, shopping, restaurants, Government Center, the Financial District and the Theater District.

Guest access
Guests have access to everything in the unit.

Other things to note
